text: The men's KL3 competition at the 2019 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships in Szeged took place at the Olympic Centre of Szeged. ==Schedule== The schedule was as follows: {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time ! Round |- | rowspan=2|Wednesday 21 August 2019 || 09:30 || Heats |- | 12:35 || Semifinals |- | rowspan=2|Saturday 24 August 2019 || 10:10 || Final B |- | style=background:lemonchiffon| 10:25
